level.heading: Definitions.
level.text: For the purposes of this chapter, the term:
"Pharmaceutical product" shall have the same meaning as provided in ยง 3- 1201.02(10A)(B)(iii).
"Practice of pharmaceutical detailing" shall have the same meaning as provided in ยง 3-1201.02(10A).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 17-131, see notes following ยง 48-844.01.
